title: Must Watch: Gee Atherton goes large to extra-large in The Slate Line
content:
The Atherton middle sibling puts a capital Gee in Gnarly in The Slate Line edit, filmed on the fast, loose slate mine slopes of wild and rugged North Wales. Could this location be home to a future tougher Welsh version of Red Bull Rampage (wild rumor)? It would certainly add a new dimension of spice… […]

The post Must Watch: Gee Atherton goes large to extra-large in The Slate Line appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
